articles.description: Australia's three most populous states of New South Wales, Victoria and Queensland reported a total of 282 COVID-19 new locally acquired infections on Sunday, with authorities struggling to quell outbreaks of the Delta variant.
articles.content: A sign at Central Station notes the implementation of new public health regulations from the state of New South Wales, as the city grapples with an outbreak of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in S… [+1951 chars]

articles.author: Joy Wang
articles.title: UNMH doctor debunks myths about COVID-19 vaccine and pregnancy - KOB
articles.description: The New Mexico Department of Health has reported 1,400 pregnant COVID cases so far — and two pregnant women have died of COVID-19.
articles.content:
McGuire, and other health care experts, said it's riskier to get COVID-19 than it is to get vaccinated.
